SELECT id, title, type, content, is_check, is_delete, `status` FROM d_agree_record
is_delete = 0 and `status` = 1
and (title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

SELECT ar.id, ar.user_id, ar.cover, ar.title, ar.content, ar.type, ar.like_number, ar.collect_number, ar.is_top, ar.is_check, ar.is_recommend, ar.is_delete, ar.`status`, ar.video, ar.images, ar.create_time, ar.update_time, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM d_agree_record ar LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = ar.user_id where ar.id = #{recordId}

SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.cover, r.type, r.title, r.images, r.video, r.like_number, r.collect_number, r.is_top, r.create_time, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM d_agree_record r LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = r.user_id
is_delete = 0 and `status` = 1
and (r.title like concat('%',#{query.title},'%') or u.nickname like concat('%',#{query.title},'%'))
and r.type = #{query.type}
ORDER BY is_top DESC, create_time DESC

SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.cover, r.type, r.title, r.images, r.video, r.like_number, r.collect_number, r.create_time, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM d_agree_record r LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = r.user_id where is_delete = 0 and `status` = 1 and is_recommend = 1 ORDER BY is_top DESC, create_time DESC
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM d_agree_record WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 1 AND id < #{recordId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM d_agree_record WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 1 AND id > #{recordId} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1
select id, title, cover as img, type, create_time from d_agree_record where is_delete = 0 and `status` = 1 order by create_time desc
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM d_agree_record GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC
